title: Carolina Panthers - Wikipedia
snippet: The team's five NFC South titles since the division's establishment in 2002 rank third to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and New Orleans Saints who are both tied at seven. The franchise is legally registered as Panther Football, LLC, and is controlled by David Tepper, whose purchase of the team from ...

title: David Tepper - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2020, the largest parts of his portfolio are Alibaba with 13% and Amazon with 11%. On September 25, 2009, Tepper purchased a 5% stake in the National Football League's (NFL) Pittsburgh Steelers. Tepper bought the NFL's Carolina Panthers from original owner and founder Jerry Richardson in May 2018, and was forced to sell his Steelers shares.
